function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Dependence on the central limit theorem for sample sizes greater than 30","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of literature on the effects of covid-19 on construction firms","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited sample size in the research","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of spss 25.0 for data analysis","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Emerging technology built by the transition of functions from biological systems","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Biomimetic transformation into a technical circumstance of the natural life cycle","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Bio-mimicked products and methods need analysis","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of hazardous materials in construction","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficient energy consumption in construction","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate waste management in construction","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential contraction of the german economy due to covid-19 impacts on the building industry and construction operations.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in credibility of personal opinions over scientific data","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overconfidence and misinformation among physicians","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Public trust in medical professionals","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of evidence-based research on the recommended use of anti-inflammatory drugs for covid-19 treatment","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on expert opinions without sufficient scientific evidence","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of evaluation of impacts of interventions","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential compromise of data privacy and individual rights due to extensive tracing using big data and deployment of the police to enforce movement restriction measures.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inequitable governance approaches leading to restricted access to safe spaces for physical activity and urban resources for certain communities.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential discrimination and harm resulting from the application of lockdown measures in a discriminatory manner.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Flaws in urban infrastructure reducing resilience to food insecurity and promoting unsafe physical activity","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of coordination in multisectoral responses to pandemics","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of effective risk-containment strategies at the community level","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Informal settlements and urban poor may not have access to safe physical activity options at home","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of guidelines on safe physical activity outdoors during a pandemic","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shift to unhealthy processed food consumption due to lack of nutritional guidelines for food parcels to the poor.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Interrupted access to food for children from households that depend on school-feeding programmes due to school closures.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disruption of routine physical activity due to stay-at-home orders and curfew measures.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exacerbation of unhealthy food consumption, physical inactivity, and sedentary behavior due to covid-19 control measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Threatened food supply and increased food insecurity due to covid-19-related closures of national borders","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contaminated air exhaust outlets leading to deposition of virus-laden droplets on equipment such as vents","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Operational limitations during an outbreak leading to inconsistent methodology and small sample size","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate cleaning of environmental surfaces in healthcare facilities","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Environmental contamination with sars-cov-2 in patient rooms and facilities","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Viral shedding in stool as a potential route of transmission for risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertain mode of transmission and extent of environmental contamination","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of specific cleaning risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Substantive discrimination in layoffs","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Industry-specific variation in layoff
